block.name: MapMQTT
block.author: Øyvin Richardsen <desarc00@gmail.com>
block.purpose: Publish points on a map in the Generic Map UI
block.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bitreactive.apps.genericmapui
Configure the Generic Map UI with the following topic: "ntnu/item/ttm4115/group0/map" (where you change group0 to your group number)
